content: end of round rnds 2-8 repeat round 1 round 9 knit around body work rnds 1-16 below or lace repeat chart twice round 1 k2 yo k1 yo ssk k2tog repeat to end of round round 2 and all even-numbered rnds to 16 knit round 3 repeat round 1 round 5 repeat round 1 round 7 repeat round 1 round 9 k2 ssk k2tog yo k1 yo repeat to end of round round 11 repeat round 9 round 13 repeat round 9 round 15 repeat round 9 * tip don t forget to work round 16 crown round 1 k2 yo k1 yo ssk k2tog repeat to end of round round 2 knit round 3 k2tog yo k1 ssk k2tog repeat to end of round 50 sts round 4 knit round 5 k1 ssk k2tog repeat to end of round 30 sts round 6 k1 k2tog repeat to end of round 20 sts round 7 k2tog repeat to end of round 10 sts finishing use a darning needle and pull yarn through remaining live stitches weave in yarn tails block gently callis version 1 0 © faking sanity 2019 all rights reserved lace chart callis version 1 0 © faking sanity 2019 all rights reserved about the designer i ve knit and crocheted for years and i ve recently started writing up my own patterns i m from dawson creek bc and run a small lys / used bookstore / coffee and tea shop called faking sanity with my friend lou we launched the peace fibre fest in 2019 that s us on the left after an exhausting but exhilarating day at our first event support + policies we all love show and tell you can share your project in our faking sanity ravelry group or use the hashtag #fakingsanitydesigns on instagram or tag @fakingsanity on facebook so we can ooh and aah over your knits this pattern has been test knit but should you encounter a problem you can contact me via email at wearefakingsanity@gmail com ravelry message to faking sanity or message @fakingsanity on facebook or instagram do not distribute copy or resell this pattern in full or in part if you want to teach a class using this pattern please purchase one copy per student this pattern is for personal use only please feel free to make as many projects as you want for yourself friends and family or charity if you choose to sell a finished item using this pattern i ask that you please give credit by listing my name the pattern name and/or the ravelry pattern page
